name: TruthorDare
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: truth or dare
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Truth or Dare, a fun skill to accompany you during your evenings.
Unforgettable evenings at home!
The skill is recommended for an adult audience

If you want to start over you can say, "Alexa, let's start over"
Currently the skill supports up to 4 players

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/smartskills.it
